dcterms:creator: S. Basu

dcterms:description: A large-scale transabdominal ultrasound video dataset containing 64 videos and 15,800 frames for learning gallbladder malignancy representations, consisting of 32 malignant and 32 non-malignant videos.
dcterms:title: In-house US Dataset for Gallbladder Cancer

dcterms:creator: S. Basu
M. Gupta
P. Rana
P. Gupta
C. Arora
dcterms:description: A publicly contributed dataset consisting of 1255 ultrasound images from 218 patients, labeled as normal, benign, or malignant, used for fine-tuning models for gallbladder malignancy detection.
dcterms:title: GBCU dataset

dcterms:description: A public lung ultrasound video dataset containing 22 videos and 1533 images, used for detecting COVID-19 pathologies.
dcterms:title: Public Lung US Dataset for COVID-19 (Butterfly)

dcterms:creator: J. Born

N. Wiedemann
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of lung ultrasound images for automatic detection of COVID-19, containing a total of 2116 images.
dcterms:title: POCUS dataset
